summary: add\'s sleeves to banded iron. plugin-less replacer.
descriptionHtml:
Middas. 6 Morning Star 4E 202

As we, I the Dovahkiin and my mage buddy Erandur, settle in for a long cold winter, preparing for a trip to the snowy island of Solsthiem, we take comfort in the small things. Apple Cabbage Stew, fresh grilled horker meat and some good Mead as we gather around the hearth at the Windpeak Inn, staring at Karita\'s tits and singing old Nord songs. Rustleif, a renowned weaponsmith here in Dawnstar, affixed sleeves of leather and chainmail to my banded iron armour, which i haven\'t worn since I first arrived in Skyrim, on account of the weather is too cold. I\'m happy I can finally use it now and I\'m packing it for my voyage.

for regular iron, use defunkt\'s Iron Armor Variant with chainmail and sleeves
of which this mod is indebted
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22684
author: Franklin Zunge
